value.name: Hobart's historic Shipwright's Arms Hotel evacuated after fire sparked by oily towels in dryer
value.description: The Tasmanian Fire Service (TFS) is warning of the dangers of spontaneous combustion, after a near miss at the historic Shipwright's Arms Hotel in Battery Point overnight. Fourteen guests had to be evacuated in near-freezing conditions just before 5:00am ...

value.name: Tasmanian welder helps build his own 'mind-controlled' prosthetic arm
value.description: Mr Lesek was not happy with the battery pack that powered the limb so he asked his friend to make a new one. "I simply had to have a solution, original batteries were too expensive. This thing is thirsty on power," he said. The best thing about the new arm?

value.name: Westcoast Wind strikes power purchase deal for Granville Harbour
value.description: Hydro Tasmania's Steve Davy said it was encouraging to see the increased focus on renewables. "The proposed Granville Harbour and Cattle Hill wind farms contribute towards plans to make Tasmania the battery of the nation," he said.

value.name: Why you're about to pay through the nose for power
